page.title: 13Children's games at school
page.content: In school children play lots of different games such as: Bulldog,Elastics,Pod and Hide and Seek. Bulldog. This is a game where any amount of people can play.One child stands in front and shouts "bulldog".The children opposite run and try not to be caught by the child alone.This carries on until all children are caught. Hide and Seek. This is where one child counts up to a certain number and the other children go and hide.The child who counted then goes to find the children who hid. Pod. This is very like Hide and Seek except that there is a race to see who gets to the counting place first. Elastics. This is just a piece of elastic tide to two posts for jumping.
